meanings.definition: Bargellos: a type of needlework characterized by a series of upright flat stitches
meanings.sent1: She learned how to create beautiful bargellos in her needlework class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed stunning bargellos made by talented artisans.
meanings.sent3: The bargellos on her pillow looked like a colorful staircase.
meanings.sent4: Her bargellos were like a rainbow dancing on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The intricate bargellos added a touch of elegance to her dress.

meanings.definition: Bargellos: a plural noun referring to a type of Italian embroidery
meanings.sent1: The shop specialized in selling traditional Italian bargellos.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate details of the bargellos on display.
meanings.sent3: The bargellos reminded her of the beautiful patterns in Italy.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with colorful bargellos that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The bargellos on the tablecloth told a story of Italian craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: Bargellos: a verb meaning to create a design using the bargello technique
meanings.sent1: She decided to bargellos a new pattern for her quilt.
meanings.sent2: Artists often bargellos intricate designs on fabric.
meanings.sent3: He bargellosed a unique pattern that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The way she bargellosed the design was truly mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: Bargellosing a new project always brought her joy and satisfaction.
